title: CBS Sets Fall 2023 Premiere Dates : Reality , Football , and Reruns
body_text:
CBS’s fall 2023 primetime lineup leans heavily into reality programming and football coverage. The network’s just announced schedule includes premiere dates for three new reality shows: Bubby Games with Josh Duhamel, Loteria Loca hosted by Jaime Camil, and Raid the Cage.
The upcoming fall season will feature new extended episodes (90 minutes instead of 60) of Survivor and The Amazing Race. The fall primetime lineup will also include Paramount Network’s Yellowstone season one, which originally debuted back in June 2018. CBS is also serving up reruns of Blue Bloods, Fire Country, NCIS, FBI, Young Sheldon, and Ghosts (the original UK version).
Paramount+’s FBI True and SEAL Team make their CBS debut this fall, filling in timeslots left vacant as the result of the writers and actors strikes. 60 Minutes will kick off season 56 on September 17 and season 36 of 48 Hours premieres on September 16.
CBS 2023 FALL PREMIERE DATES
SATURDAY, SEPT. 2
7:30-11:00 PM COLLEGE FOOTBALL ON CBS: TEXAS TECH at WYOMING
SATURDAY, SEPT. 9
7:30-11:00 PM COLLEGE FOOTBALL ON CBS: UCLA at SAN DIEGO STATE
THURSDAY, SEPT. 14
8:00-9:00 PM BIG BROTHER (Live Show)

10:00-11:00 PM THE CHALLENGE: USA

NFL on CBS Football Doubleheader*
